attributes.action: Ban all imports of Russian Oil and Gas entering the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Russian Oil and Gas provides Putin and his war machine the access to funding and is the only way to serious cripple Putin's attempt to unstabilise Europe.

There maybe consequences for the UK and Europe as a direct result of these actions but this is a small price to pay for ending this war and Putin control over Ukraine and it people.
attributes.background: We want the government to place an immediate ban on all imports of oil and gas from Russia to the UK and being traded by any UK company in a effort to cripple Putin's war against the Ukraine

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Ban all imports of Russian oil and gas immediately
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610289
